alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 8:42PM MST until December 13 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, and Bent Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
